Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Prodaje se prekrasna, potpuno opremljena vila s privatnim bazenom, smještena u mirnom okruženju u naselju Kolumbera, na devet kilometara od Grada Poreča, spremna je za useljenje bez dodatnih ulaganja. Vila, ukupne površine 144 m², pruža udoban i komforan smještaj za do sedam osoba. Vila se sastoji od prostranog i svijetlog open-space koncepta koji objedinjuje moderno opremljenu i u potpunosti funkcionalnu kuhinju, blagovaonicu i udoban dnevni boravak s izlazom na dvije terase - jednu sunčanu natkrivenu južnu terasu idealnu za uživanje u popodnevnim zrakama sunca, te jednu sjenovitu sjevernu terasu, savršenu za opuštanje u hladnijim dijelovima dana. Za dodatnu praktičnost, tu se nalazi i gostinjski WC. Mogućnost ugradnje kamina na kruta goriva. U spavaćem dijelu vile nalaze se dvije elegantne klimatizirane spavaće sobe svaka sa svojom en suite kupaonicom opremljenom s walk in tuš kabinom, wc-om i podnim grijanjem. Vila se nalazi na zemljištu površine 596 m², koje nudi dovoljno prostora za uživanje na otvorenom. U dvorištu se nalazi natkriveni parking, bazen površine 27 m², idealan za osvježenje tijekom toplih ljetnih dana, a pored bazena se nalazi i solarni tuš. Na dvorištu se također nalazi natkriveni zidani roštil, koji je savršen za pripremu ukusnih obroka na otvorenom . Vila je u potpunosti klimatizirana i orijentirana sjever-jug, što osigurava ugodnu klimu tijekom cijele godine. Dvorište je dodatno ukrašeno mediteranskim biljem. Ova vila je odlična kako za odmor i stanovanje, tako i za dugoročno planirano ulaganje. Nalazi se na nekoliko minuta vožnje do autoceste (istarski ipsilon). Prodaje je se potpuno namještna s cjelokupnim inventarom. Grijanje je na struju, sve prostorije su klimatizirane, a kupanice imaju podno grijanje. Kupac ne placa porez, nekretnina se prodaje s poslovanjem (firmom). Papiri uredni, vlasništvo čisto, mogućnost kupnje putem kredita. Za sve dodatne informacije molim da nam se obratite na: Josip Gluhak Licencirani agent za posredovanje nekretninama +385 95 535 6362 j.gluhak@remax.hr REMAX City 4 Ulica Baltazara Adama Krčelića 16, Zaprešić Sve informacije dane od agenta smatraju se važećim, no moraju se zasebno procijeniti. A beautiful, fully equipped villa with a private pool is for sale, located in a quiet environment in the village of Kolumbera, nine kilometers from the city of Poreč, it is ready to move into without additional investments. The villa, with a total area of ​​144 m², provides comfortable accommodation for up to seven people. The villa consists of a spacious and bright open-space concept that combines a modernly equipped and fully functional kitchen, a dining room and a comfortable living room with access to two terraces - one sunny covered southern terrace ideal for enjoying the afternoon rays of the sun, and one shady northern terrace, perfect for relaxing in the cooler parts of the day. For added convenience, there is also a guest toilet. The possibility of installing a solid fuel fireplace. In the sleeping part of the villa, there are two elegant air-conditioned bedrooms, each with its own en suite bathroom equipped with a walk-in shower, toilet and underfloor heating. The villa is located on a plot of land of 596 m², which offers enough space to enjoy the outdoors. In the yard there is a covered parking lot, a swimming pool of 27 m², ideal for refreshment during hot summer days, and next to the pool there is also a solar shower. There is also a covered brick barbecue in the yard, which is perfect for preparing delicious meals outdoors. The villa is fully air-conditioned and oriented north-south, which ensures a pleasant climate throughout the year. The yard is additionally decorated with Mediterranean plants. This villa is great both for vacation and living, as well as for a long-term planned investment. It is located a few minutes drive to the highway (Istrian epsilon). It is for sale fully furnished with the entire inventory. The heating is electric, all rooms are air-conditioned, and the bathrooms have underfloor heating. The buyer does not pay taxes, the property is sold with business (company). The papers are in order, the property is clean, the possibility of buying on credit.
